Title: It's the best I have ever had
Review: I took my wife here for a birthday celebration.Overall it was a great dining experience the food was high quality, the wine was excellent and the waiter was attentive, informative and engaging. This is perfect for a romantic dinner if you are in Parnell.

Title: The most authentic experience.
Review: My partner and I were looking for a place to have a lunch on my birthday, which happen to be on Christmas day, when not many places are open. We had a great surprise when we found le bistro des gourmets!

Title: Don't hesitate, book now!
Review: If I could have given Le Bistro six stars I would have done! I have spent several years in France and this restaurant is the real thing. The food was sublime, from the goats cheese creme brulee to the crepes suzettes, via one of the best fish dishes I have ever tasted.

Title: Great atmosphere, authentic
Review: Great atmosphere, authentic flavours, amazing service, beautiful wines... very French! Enjoyed a romantic dinner, over viewing busy life in Parnell, white set tables and lovely food.

Title: Very nice lunch!!
Review: Very nice lunch!! The whole family came unannounced and the staff is still very inviting and friendly! We had pork, veal, fish and duck and all of them is delicious and very well presented! The ambiance is cozy..

Title: I can see why this was number 1!
Review: I took my wife here for a birthday celebration.Overall it was a great dining experience the food was high quality, the wine was excellent and the waiter was attentive, informative and engaging. This is perfect for a romantic dinner if you are in Parnell.
